events.title: Moon Landing
events.description: Apollo 11, the spaceflight that first landed humans on the Moon, was launched by NASA. The crew included Commander Neil Armstrong, Lunar Module Pilot Buzz Aldrin, and Command Module Pilot Michael Collins.

events.title: First Use of ARPANET
events.description: The ARPANET, the precursor to the modern internet, sent its first message. This was a significant milestone in the development of global digital communication.

events.title: Introduction of UNIX
events.description: The UNIX operating system, a revolutionary multitasking and multiuser computer operating system, was developed at Bell Labs.
